summary: The document is an unclassified identification form from INSCOM/CSF related to the JFK Assassination System, detailing an investigation into Manuel Marti and his character reference, Aleanso Ortiz. It includes a postal removal check conducted in the Bronx, New York, and interactions with parole officer Angel L. Rivera regarding Ortiz and Marti's whereabouts. The document was released with deletions.
key_findings: The investigation is connected to the JFK assassination system.
A postal removal check for Aleanso Ortiz found no record for Ortiz but did find a removal for an Andre Ortiz.
Parole officer Angel L. Rivera denied knowing Ortiz or Marti, explaining the postal removal was for his mother-in-law, Andre Ortiz, who had returned to Puerto Rico.
